author: dallas.spatz
post_text: July 26, 2016 at 2:59 PM#1Can anyone help me? I want to create and run a macro that will trigger effects at particular times of the day. I.E. if I wanted to set up a macro to Lamp Off my fixtures at 4 am, or run another macro or cue at 10 PM... I'm sure this is possible, I'm just not sure the syntax. Thanks for your input!
